meanings.definition: One who talks or acts in a trivial or insignificant manner.
meanings.sent1: The piffler in our group always brings up unimportant topics.
meanings.sent2: She dismissed him as a piffler, not taking his words seriously.
meanings.sent3: The piffler's jokes may be silly, but they always make us smile.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ideas, he was just a piffler among giants.
meanings.sent5: The piffler's chatter filled the room with light-hearted banter.

meanings.definition: To talk or act in a trivial or insignificant manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't piffler on about things that don't matter.
meanings.sent2: He tends to piffler when he's nervous, rambling on without purpose.
meanings.sent3: She pifflered on, unaware that nobody was listening.
meanings.sent4: His mind would often piffler away during boring meetings.
meanings.sent5: The children pifflered excitedly about their upcoming field trip.
